data.message: Thank you thank you!   To all those complaining try saying Thank you when someone gives you something for free!  Me I love mine and am grateful!  Facebook you rock!

replies.message: We see it once and then no more!  Would have loved to have shared mine with others.  Thank you Facebook for letting me see it once.
We didn't get anything. Lots of us didn't. So why shouldn't we complain?
Just because someone gives something should everyone complain they didn't get anything. Or maybe they just haven't finished with everyone yet.   Gosh it's a 30 sec video.  Don't you have a life?
I also would like my video bck, it only played one time and I close the page, and when I was going to watch it again there was only a note. How can I get my video bck???
so im guessing u got ur video.... telling us not to complain!!!! if they r doing this then everyone deserves a video!!! thank you!!!!!!

Yes Linda Wilkinson you love yours. That means you got one. Those of us that didn't get ANYTHING are disappointed. Facebook said they were doing look back movies for everyone. They didn't. Some people got NOTHING! At least say why, don't just ignore the issue.
